Header: Japanese businessmen to expand investment opportunities in Sri Lanka
Content: A firm determination has arisen by the Japanese businessmen to expand investment opportunities in Sri Lanka. A team of Japanese businessmen has arrived in the island to explore such investment opportunities. Japanese investors have focused their special attention to expanding investment opportunities in Sri Lanka. They recently met the Sri Lankan business community in Colombo. Discussions between the two sides dealt at length with respect to business and production opportunities. The oevent was organized under the patronage of Proprietor of the Serendib Green Institute and Takima Tek Institute Shaheeda Hettiarachchi. Leading investors from Japan joined in the occasion.
